definitions.text: (of winds or weather) tending to promote or facilitate
examples: the days were fair and the winds were favorable

definitions.text: presaging or likely to bring good luck
examples: a favorable time to ask for a raise
a prosperous moment to make a decision

definitions.text: inclined to help or support; not antagonistic or hostile
examples: a government friendly to our interests

definitions.text: occurring at a convenient or suitable time
examples: an opportune time to receive guests
